EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Configure a Calculated Insight for the Maximize Revenue Recommender (Example)

The goal-based Maximize Revenue recommender requires that the calculated insight in the item data graph contains SQL code that calculates the sum of products sold. Einstein Personalization uses the output from the insight to create a list of top-selling products. You can use the SQL code provided in the Product Sales Standard Insight by adding it to your calculated insight.

Create a Calculated Insight Using SQL .
Complete the insight using the SQL expression in the Product Sales Standard Insight reference.
You can also add the SQL code to another insight that you plan to use in your item data graph.
